entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
